title: Sister Sleuth and the Silver Blaze
subtle: Adventure (fiction), 2,117 words, Level V (Grade 4), Lexile 670L, Fiction Series
description: Sister Sleuth and the Silver Blaze recounts another one of Miguel's adventures as he dives into another Great Gallardo book. In this adventure, he travels into the past, becoming Mr. Watson and solving a mystery with Sherlock Holmes. In a surprise twist, he gets unexpected help from someone he knows. Illustrations support the text.
